name: cbncms
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)), wcel(c0, cnv))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈ CBan, c1 ∈(CMet ` c2), c0 ∈ NrmCVec)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ccbn), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CBan → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ CBan ↔(c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈(CMet ` c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ccbn), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CBan → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ CBan ↔(c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈(CMet ` c2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ccbn), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cims, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CBan ↔(c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈(CMet ` c2)))
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(IndMet ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cims, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CBan → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(IndMet ` c0)

comment: The induced metric on complex Banach space is complete. (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2007.) Use ~ bncmet (or preferably ~ bncms ) instead. (New usage is discouraged.)
